summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of AutoClick system. Backend APIs are mostly functional with 87.5% success rate. Automation engine is working correctly and processing sites. Found several validation and endpoint issues that need attention.

critical_bugs.issue: Accepts invalid site data (empty name, invalid URL, negative duration)
critical_bugs.impact: Data integrity issues, potential system instability
critical_bugs.details: API should validate input data and reject invalid entries

endpoint_issues.issue: Returns 404 'Site not found' instead of exporting sites
endpoint_issues.details: Endpoint seems to be treating request as individual site lookup

infrastructure_issues.impact: Real-time communication not working in production
infrastructure_issues.details: WebSocket connection fails with server rejection, likely proxy/deployment issue

false_positives.details: System correctly prevents starting already running automation

frontend_issues.note: Frontend testing was skipped as requested - backend only testing

passed_tests: System Status - Correctly reports running state
Site CRUD Operations - Create, Read, Update, Delete, Toggle all working
Logs Functionality - Get, Filter, Export (JSON/CSV/TXT) all working
Settings Management - Get and Update working correctly
Bulk Import - Successfully imports multiple sites
Error Handling - Correctly handles non-existent resources
Database Persistence - Sites and logs properly stored
Automation Engine - Successfully processing active sites (17 clicks recorded)
action_item_for_E1: Fix input validation in site creation endpoint - reject invalid data
Fix sites export endpoint (/api/sites/export) - currently returns 404
Investigate WebSocket deployment configuration - getting HTTP 502 errors
Consider adding more comprehensive input validation across all endpoints
should_call_test_agent_after_fix: true - WebSocket functionality needs retesting after infrastructure fix, and validation fixes need verification
